events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund for the purchase as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back on a recent order.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so that I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket was too small despite checking the size guide carefully.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request. You should receive the money back within 5-7 business days after the item is returned to us.
Thanks for acting fast on this! I will send the jacket back today and appreciate the quick refund processing.
We received your returned jacket and have processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow a few days for it to reflect.
Just following up to confirm that your refund has been received. Please let us know if you have any other questions or concerns.
Since your refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
